text: U. S. Grant High School is a high school in south Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. ==Notable alumni== *Jim Bolding, world record holder in the 440-yard hurdles (class of 1968) ==References== ==External links== * U S Grant High School * Oklahoma City Public Schools Category:Public high schools in Oklahoma Category:Educational institutions established in 1953 Category:Schools in Oklahoma City Category:1953 establishments in Oklahoma
title: U. S. Grant High School (Oklahoma)
